assignments.name: Set_renewal_to_found_ent_opp
assignments.label: Set renewal to found ent opp

formulas.name: Renewal_contract_governing_terms
formulas.expression: CASE({!Get_CW_Opp.Contract.Governing_Terms__c}, "Online ToS","Online ToS", "Standard MSA", "Pre-Existing MSA", "Custom MSA", "Pre-Existing MSA", "Pre-Existing MSA","Pre-Existing MSA", "" )

formulas.name: Renewal_Opp_Name
formulas.expression: IF(ISBLANK({!Get_CW_Opp.Account.Account_Name_Short__c}),{!Get_CW_Opp.Account.Name},{!Get_CW_Opp.Account.Account_Name_Short__c}) & " - " & CASE({!Renewal_Subtype}, "Renewal - Annual","Renewal", "Renewal - Quarterly","Renewal", "Renewal - Bi-Monthly","Renewal", "Renewal - Bridge","Bridge Renewal", "Renewal - Pilot Conversion","Pilot Conversion", "Renewal" ) & " " & TEXT(MONTH({!Renewal_Start_Date} )) & "/" & TEXT(YEAR({!Renewal_Start_Date}))

formulas.name: Renewal_Subtype
formulas.expression: IF(ISPICKVAL({!Get_CW_Opp.Type},"Pilot"), "Renewal - Pilot Conversion", IF( {!Renewal_contract_term}>12, "Renewal - Annual", CASE({!Renewal_contract_term}, 2,"Renewal - Bi-Monthly", 3,"Renewal - Quarterly", 6,"Renewal - Semi-Annual", 12,"Renewal - Annual", "Renewal - Bridge" ) ) )

formulas.name: slack_renewal_timing
formulas.expression: IF( {!Get_CW_Opp.Auto_close__c}, "Automatically ", "Manually " )& IF( {!Get_CW_Opp.Time_to_Renewal_days__c} = 0, "on target close date", IF( {!Get_CW_Opp.Time_to_Renewal_days__c} < 0, TEXT({!Get_CW_Opp.Time_to_Renewal_days__c} * -1)&" days after target close date", TEXT({!Get_CW_Opp.Time_to_Renewal_days__c})&" days before target close date" ) )

Flow.interviewLabel: Opportunity - Committed Closed Won Automations v2 {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}
Flow.label: Opportunity - Committed Closed Won Automations v2

textTemplates.name: premium_support_gong
textTemplates.text:

Total Support ARR: {!premium_support_arr}

Sales Owner: {!Get_CW_Opp.Owner.Slack_Mention_With_Role_Full_Name__c}

textTemplates.name: slack_contraction_post
textTemplates.text:
:chart_with_downwards_trend: {!Get_CW_Opp.Name} contracted * :chart_with_downwards_trend:


Account: {!Get_CW_Opp.Account.Name}

{!Get_CW_Opp.Account.Account_Status__c} | {!Get_CW_Opp.Account.Segment__c} | {!Get_CW_Opp.Account.NumberOfEmployees} employees | {!Get_CW_Opp.Account.Industry} | {!Get_CW_Opp.Account.Customer_Success_Tier__c}


Sales Owner: {!Get_CW_Opp.Owner.Slack_Mention_With_Role_Full_Name__c}

Technical Account Manager: {!slack_TAM}

Customer Since: {!Get_CW_Opp.Account.Customer_Since__c}

Renewal Baseline Annualized Revenue: ${!Get_CW_Opp.Renewal_Baseline_ARR__c} 

Contraction Reason(s): {!Get_CW_Opp.Churn_Reason__c}

Alternative Solution: {!Get_CW_Opp.Alternative_Solution__c}

Contraction Reason Details: {!Get_CW_Opp.Churn_Reason_Details__c}

{!vertical_team_alert}
